Title: AquaVentus at the North Sea Summit
Description: AquaVentus demands: Think offshore wind and hydrogen together consistently, remove obstacles, accelerate electrolysis expansion.

Title: Improve NEP
Description: Berlin, January 15, 2026. The currently submitted draft of the Grid Development Plan (NEP) by the transmission system operators (TSOs) does not meet the requirements of a modern energy system and endangers Germany as an industrial location.

Title: Consultation on the Wind Energy Amendment
Description: Hydrogen industry urges combined connection concepts and warns of compensation claims

Title: New study by Frontier Economics shows:
Description: System costs can be reduced by up to 1.7 billion per year through offshore sector coupling

Title: Strengthen Network
Description: Between warm candlelight and lively conversations, connections emerged that go far beyond the business framework. An evening that showed: Behind the projects and strategies are people who share a common vision with passion and conviction.
